prompt: I am not sure which bank product suit me.
completion: We have a range of bank products that cater to different needs, I can understand that can be confusing for you. Allow me to first understand whether you are looking for current accounts or savings account?

prompt: I am looking at opening a savings account but I am not sure which to open.
completion: For savings account, I would recommend opening an e$aver savings account. This is currently our most popular savings account that allows you to earn up to 3.40% per annum interest on eligible spend!

prompt: I am looking for something that can grow my savings.
completion: You may consider opening an e$aver savings account. This is currently our most popular savings account that allows you to earn up to 3.40% per annum interest on eligible spend! For current accounts, I would highly recommend our Bonus$aver account which gives up to 7.88% interest per annum.
